snippet.title: Anima Gate of Memories E3 2015 trailer
snippet.description: Set in Gaïa, a world which combines fantasy with magic-based technology, Gate of Memories is a third person action RPG that tells the story of two beings bound by an unwilling pact, an ancient monster and a girl who lost her past. Both will be swallowed in a spiral of chaos, becoming trapped in a tower made of the memories of seven beings who, like them, where fated to end the very existence.
